changeSet.author: david.broder-rodgers@softwire.com

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM wp_posts WHERE post_name IN ('domestic-property-after-2018', 'property-after-2020', 'epc-required', 'tenancy-type', 'epc-below-e', 'recommended-improvements', 'improvements-at-no-cost', 'tenant-consent', 'property-devaluation', 'temporary-exclusions')

changeSet.sql: -- This is only run on MySQL as the H2 database does not have the correct fields -- This migration adds the MEES questionnaire questions if they aren't already present. INSERT INTO `wp_posts` (post_author, post_date, post_date_gmt, post_content, post_title, post_excerpt, post_status, comment_status, ping_status, post_password, post_name, to_ping, pinged, post_modified, post_modified_gmt, post_content_filtered, post_parent, guid, menu_order, post_type, post_mime_type, comment_count) VALUES (1, '2018-04-18 10:00:00', '2018-04-18 10:00:00', '', 'Domestic Property After 2018', '', 'publish', 'closed', 'closed', '', 'domestic-property-after-2018', '', '', '2018-04-18 10:00:00', '2018-04-18 10:00:00', '', 0, '', 0, 'question', '', 0); SET @post_id = LAST_INSERT_ID(); INSERT INTO `wp_postmeta` (post_id, meta_key, meta_value) VALUES (@post_id, '_autoOpenQuestionReason', 'field_5a0c5ddf40b11'), (@post_id, 'autoOpenQuestionReason', '0'), (@post_id, '_questionReason', 'field_5a0179b00e182'), (@post_id, 'questionReason', ''), (@post_id, '_helpHtml', 'field_59e8cfc09ab2a'), (@post_id, 'helpHtml', 'This can be to either new or existing tenants.'), (@post_id, '_questionHeading', 'field_59e8be23eda3e'), (@post_id, 'questionHeading', 'Will you be letting a domestic property after 1st April 2018?'); SET @post_id = LAST_INSERT_ID(); INSERT INTO `wp_postmeta` (post_id, meta_key, meta_value) VALUES (@post_id, '_autoOpenQuestionReason', 'field_5a0c5ddf40b11'), (@post_id, 'autoOpenQuestionReason', '0'), (@post_id, '_questionReason', 'field_5a0179b00e182'), (@post_id, 'questionReason', ''), (@post_id, '_helpHtml', 'field_59e8cfc09ab2a'), (@post_id, 'helpHtml', 'These can be if you recently became a landlord or if wall insulation cannot be installed.'), (@post_id, '_questionHeading', 'field_59e8be23eda3e'), (@post_id, 'questionHeading', 'Are there any other \"temporary exclusions\" from improvement?');
